title: PM grieved over death of MQM leader Kanwar Naveed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 18 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Friday expressed grief over the death of Muttahida Qaumi Movement leader Kanwar Naveed Jameel.
The prime minister prayed for peace of the departed soul.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty to grant strength to bereaved family to bear the loss with equanimity.
